meaningMnemonic: When you ride your <radical>scooter</radical> on the <radical>ground</radical> listening to <radical>music</radical> under the <radical>sun</radical>, you're bound to <kanji>encounter</kanji> a bunch of new people! They hear your music playing as you scoot by and they come out to <kanji>meet</kanji> you.
readingMnemonic: Everyone you <kanji>encounter</kanji> wants to bare their <reading>sou</reading>l (そう) to you, literally. They're all coming out to meet you, pulling back their skin and showing you the soul ghosts inside of them.
